description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(792).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,394,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator/@Convergents[Sqrt[792], 30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 17 2011 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 7 x - x^2)/(x^4 - 394 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 25}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 23 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
